survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with their home office setups, identifying areas for improvement to enhance productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly for remote employees.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?

questions.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you currently have? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Consider adding 'Other' with a text field if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you currently have? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Leave as open-ended to capture diverse responses. Avoid leading questions.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face with your home office setup?

questions.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain due to your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. Ensure clarity to avoid misinterpretation.

script.question_text: How often do you experience discomfort or pain due to your home office setup?

questions.question_text: Which of the following would most improve your home office setup? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize needs. Include an 'Other' option for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with max selection limit (multi-choice)

script.question_text: Which of the following would most improve your home office setup? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Does your employer provide any financial support or reimbursement for home office equipment?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple yes/no format with an option for uncertainty.

script.question_text: Does your employer provide any financial support or reimbursement for home office equipment?

questions.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working from your home office?
questions.client_notes: Group hours into ranges for easier analysis. Ensure ranges are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How many hours per day do you typically spend working from your home office?

questions.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily use for remote work?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for flexibility. Avoid overlapping categories.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input (single-choice)

script.question_text: What type of workspace do you primarily use for remote work?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend improvements to your home office setup to your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Place after relevant questions for context.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend improvements to your home office setup to your employer?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding your home office setup.
questions.client_notes: Leave open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions regarding your home office setup.
